snippet: A number of photo-sharing sites are being transformed from places to look at pictures into tools to connect historical documents and give more people a sense of history.
abstract: Tool Kit column observes that a number of photo-sharing sites are being transformed from places to look at pictures into tools to connect historical documents and give more people a sense of history; notes some sites key images to maps and many allow searches.
lead_paragraph: A number of photo-sharing sites are being transformed from places to look at pictures into tools to connect historical documents and give more people a sense of history.

headline.seo: Web Sites and Apps Join Images to Places
headline.main: Web Sites With a Historical Bent Join a Place to an Image
headline.print_headline: Web Sites With a Historical Bent Join a Place to an Image
